name: The Broken Staff
description:
Description:

This game was made in 10 days, for a game jam, where the theme was "The more you have, the worse it is"! You are a newbie mage who just got her first staff, but was unlucky enough to break it immediately.

How to play: 

Defeat the enemies to be able to make your way into the next stages! But do be careful: Your wand is broken, and the more spells you use with it, the harder it gets to control it!

Controls:

  •  WASD:  Movement
  • Space: Dash
  • Mouse Left: Shoot and interact
  • Esc: Pause

Oh boy, did the team have fun making this one! And it's such an improvement from our last game, too! We really hope you enjoy it! :)

-Toasterbit Studio.
